definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (Aram. and rare) attack, smite down (cf. Ar. h.araba plunder, III. wage war with, VI. fight together, h.arbun war, battle; Syr. h.rab smite, slay)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Imv. ms. [[חֲרׂב]] Je 50:21 attack (+ [[וְהַחֲרֵם אַחֲרֵיהֶם]]); mpl. [[חִרְבוּ]] v:Je 50:27 obj. [[כָּל־פָּרֶיהָ]], fig. of men of Babylon.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: ) [[הָחֳרֵב]] 2Ki 3:23 the kings have attacked one another, fought together (‖[[וַיַּכּוּ אִישׁ אֶת־רֵעֵהוּ]]).

definitions.title: Niph.,
definitions.body: but rd. perhaps [[הֵחָרֵב]], cf. Dr Le 19:20, note.
